comments: this video is filled with beomgyu’s aesthetic, from the song and film camera pictures to the glare of the sun's rays on the water and the lights of the night city. and of course, his beautiful voice. i hope more people will fall in love with beomie and give him lots of compliments. he’s really our comfort person and he deserves all the praises ♡ ily bby

Никогда раньше не слышала его сольного пения. У Бомгю, оказывается, красивый голос и очень приятный тембр. И клип тоже симпатичный - такой простой и естественный - очень ему подходит. Отлично получилось!
Охх, мой комфортный мальчик.. Хайб, дайте им уже сольные песни, я не выдерживаю, это слишком прекрасно. Голос Гю такой успокаивающий и бархатный.
голос бомгю так успокаивает и убаюкивает...самый прекрасный кавер в мире!! бомгю мы тебя любим

since 1 year ago in one of his V lives he started that song I said "I need BEOMGYU to sing that song" because I knew his voice would sound incredible, and that's how it was, it sounds perfect, I love it.
Thank you BEOMGYU for making me happy ️🫶🇲🇽

VAMOS POR MÁS, MOA!!
RECUERDEN SEGUIR VOTANDO POR LOS CHICOS EN LOS MAMA Y EN LOS AMAs :)

Beomgyu's voice is like:
- a hug from your favorite person
- the smell of coffee in the morning
- the peace when you watch the calming sea

This feels like a calming walk around the park, sitting by the river, walking while holding hands under the moonlight, watching the sunset from afar, looking at the window with earphones on a subway train, walking along the beach on a noonday, peacefully riding on a bike, laying on a grass watching the cloudy skies and feeling the cool breeze with open arms

No te merecemos, eres tan lindo por esforzarte tanto en hacer un video y un cover con tanta dedicación, dejando ver tu gran talento y el amor que tienes por Moa, sin duda eres la persona más hermosa que puede existir

Ouvir a voz do beomgyu me dá uma sensação de conforto️‍
Você é incrível, beom!!

La voz de BeomGyu hace que todos mis problemas se alejen por un momento, su voz es arte, es algo que no puedo describir con simples palabras, su voz me hace querer abrazarlo, simplemente con esta cancion su voz se luce mucho

Tengo tantas ganas de llorar, y no se si es por lo hermosa que se escucha su voz o de que podría haberlo escuchado en vivo  
Ya es una necesidad de que vuelvan a Chile
BEOMGYU'S  VOCAL SUPREMACY!

I was studying and suddenly I decided to enter YouTube to study some things that I could not understand during the lesson , but the first thing that appeared to me was this.. I swear I felt my tears rolling down , I will consider this song as a gift for me. thank you from the bottom of my heart. Words are so amazing that I can't describe her beauty. Beomgyu, thank you for being in our lives Please know that we are with you and will love you forever , It's okay to cry and feel bad Please don't hide your grief and don't do anything beyond your capacity.. I don't know if you will see this , but I hope my words reach you..

I was getting ready for work when I got the notification that this cover was uploaded. I usually watch an episode of To Do to start my day, but I decided to listen to this first. Prior to this cover, I had come across "WONDER" and kept it on repeat; I even recommended it to a few acquaintances. My gosh, this cover...I did not expect to react as emotionally as I did (there were multiple times where I began tearing up). Beomgyu's vocals are so gentle and soft here, and really capture a sense of coziness and warmth - perfect for fall. Thank you for being here, Beomgyu! <3 We love and appreciate you!
